articles.title: Statue of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il Erected at KPA Unit
articles.content:
Statue of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il Erected at KPA Unit 
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A statue of the great leader Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was erected at Unit 10215 of the Korean People's Army.
					 The statue depicts the great Generalissimo imposingly standing with one of his hands placed on his waist, his face beaming with a broad smile. He seems to call on all the service personnel and people to dynamically advance towards a final victory, wishing the great Paektusan nation a rosy future of eternal prosperity. 
					
					 Its unveiling ceremony took place on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, officials concerned, commanding officers and service personnel of the unit, military families, officials and employees of the unit who contributed to the erection of the statue.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam and Kim Won Hong unveiled the statue.
					
					 A floral basket with a ribbon bearing the august name of Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un was laid before the statue.
					
					 Placed then before it were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and a floral basket in the name of KPA Unit 10215.
					
					 All the participants made bows to the statue of the illustrious brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Kim Won Hong said in his unveiling speech that Generalissimo Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into an eternal party of Comrade Kim Il Sung and turned the socialist country into an invincible politico-ideological power and a world class military power.
					
					  Kim Jong Il's extraordinary leadership provided a sure guarantee for foiling all anti-DPRK plots of the U.S.-led imperialists and defending the single-minded unity of the revolutionary forces and Juche-oriented socialism as firm as an iron wall, he added.
					
					 He called on all service personnel and people to work hard to win a final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, united close behind Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 After being briefed on the statue, the participants looked round the statue.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Swedish Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Swedish Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Karl-Olof Andersson, new Swedish ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday. 
					 After receiving the credentials, he had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Greetings to Guinean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Guinean President
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Guinean President Alpha Conde on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long historic tradition would grow stronger in various fields.
					
					 He wished the president and people of Guinea greater success in their work for the political stability and the socio-economic development of the country.

articles.title: Head of DPRK Delegation to FM Meeting of G-77 on Ways for Enhancing Capability of Joint Actions
articles.content:
Head of DPRK Delegation to FM Meeting of G-77 on Ways for Enhancing Capability of Joint Actions 
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The head of the DPRK delegation to the Foreign Ministers' meeting of the G-77 made a speech on September 28.
					 It is imperative that the G-77/China move towards enhancing the capability of joint actions with the strategy of unity and overcome the challenges in the way of advance, he said, and continued: 
					
					 The important issue in strengthening joint actions of the G-77/China is to direct due attention to the protection and exercise of the sovereign rights and interests of developing countries, and, in particular, their right to development. 
					
					 In order to enhance the joint action capabilities of the G-77/China, it is indispensable to put in place a mode of economic development that suits the trend of world economy and specific conditions of developing countries. 
					
					 The ever more worsening contradictions between the North and South in international economic relations demand that the G-77/China exert more active efforts to revitalize the South-South cooperation.  
					
					 Following the trend of global economy towards sustainable development and green growth, our country is continuously improving and strengthening the economic structure and development methodology to suit our conditions and is actively encouraging international exchanges and cooperation in this area. 
					
					 The government of the DPRK will, in the future, too, continue to actively contribute to achieving the common cause of the G-77/China for the establishment of new economic relations based on justice, equality and impartiality.

articles.title: Fiji Foreign Minister Arrives
articles.content:
Fiji Foreign Minister Arrives 
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Inoke Kubuabola, minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Fiji, and his party arrived here by air on Tuesday.

articles.title: Dalian-Mt. Kumgang International Tourist Group Arrives
articles.content:
Dalian-Mt. Kumgang International Tourist Group Arrives
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The first group of Dalian-Mt. Kumgang international tourism led by Kim Chun Il, general manager of the Dalian Furama International Travel Service Co. Ltd., arrived here by air on Tuesday.
					 The group will tour Mt. Kumgang and visit various places of Pyongyang and Kaesong City.

articles.title: New Education System Hailed by Educators in DPRK
articles.content:
New Education System Hailed by Educators in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Sept. 25 promulgated an ordinance on enforcing the universal 12-year compulsory education.
					 This new education system, a progress of the former 11-year compulsory education system, has been warmly received by the educators in across the country. 
					
					 Sin Se Hung, first vice-minister of General Education under the Education Commission, told KCNA:
					
					 "The 12-year education system is the most reasonable one as it makes it possible to improve the secondary general education in keeping with the requirements of the IT era, the era of knowledge-based economy.
					
					 The new system helps remove the limitation of the existing system, whereby primary schoolers felt it hard to get clear understanding of what they learned while suffering from the pressure of intensive study.
					
					 It is a scientific education system that ensures the education of juvenile and adolescent children according to their growth and age and psychological characteristics.
					
					 I am sure that there will be a radical turn in content and qualities of the secondary education for students to acquire rich and broad knowledge in accordance with the rapid development of science and technology and develop the ability to support themselves in society."
					
					 Ju Jong Sil, president of Kim Chol Ju University of Education, said:
					
					 "The new education system is the most popular and superior one under which all the rising generations are given high-level education at the state expense until they grow old enough to work.
					
					 The new system and the present situation require us, educationists directly responsible for the education of the rising generation, will fully discharge our duty and role.
					
					 Thanks to the enforcement of the 12-year education system, a reflection of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's love for the rising generation and the future, the DPRK will further demonstrate itself as a civilized socialist country."

articles.title: Recovery Operations Make Brisk Headway in Disaster-hit Komdok Area
articles.content:
Recovery Operations Make Brisk Headway in Disaster-hit Komdok Area
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A dynamic drive is going on to recover Komdok area from flood damage.
					 The headquarters for recovery operations has channeled main efforts into bringing the living of the inhabitants in the afflicted areas to normal and putting the production on a normal footing at the mines in Komdok area. Measures have been taken in advance to ensure a timely supply of cement, gravel and sand and other materials needed for the construction of dwelling houses. Projects have also been pushed forward to repair production buildings and overhaul equipment, etc.
					
					 Housing construction is making brisk headway at various mines.
					
					Soldiers of the Korean People's Army are pushing ahead with the construction of dwelling houses at a rapid tempo under the uplifted slogan "Let's Help People!" Builders from various units and people in the disaster-stricken areas are bringing about collective innovations in the projects by pooling efforts and wisdom with service personnel. 
					
					 The construction of houses for more than 1 700 families has entered the stage of building walls in a matter of less than a fortnight. More successes are being reported from the housing projects.
					
					 The designing for the construction of public buildings including nurseries, kindergartens, schools and hospitals was wound up and necessary preparations are making rapid progress.
					
					 The projects to improve Pukchon River including dredging, dyke building and reinforcing and repair roads are also going full steam ahead. 
					
					Officials and workers in the railway sector succeeded in rehabilitating the railways from Tanchon to Paekgumsan in a matter of ten odd days.
					
					 A high-pitched drive is now under way at various mines to put the production on a normal footing.
					
					 The Komdok Mining Complex has almost completed a huge amount of work to overhaul equipment even under hard conditions.
					
					 Production restarted at Ore Dressing Plant No. 3, the Youth Mine, the Namphung Mine, the Roun Mine and other units. The remaining units will be able to restart production before long.
					
					 The Ryongyang Mine is reporting a signal success in the production of minerals and light burned magnesia. 
					
					 The Taehung Youth Hero Mine started operating the process for the production of briquettes. The Pukdu Branch Mine carried out a blasting operation to remove 10 000 cubic meters of earth on Sept. 24, making a breakthrough in mineral production.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Learning from Work Style of Officials in 1970s
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Learning from Work Style of Officials in 1970s
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- If officials are to creditably fulfill their missions and roles as commanding personnel of the revolution at present, they should learn from the ideological and moral traits of the officials during the period of laying down the Party's foundation for carrying forward the cause of Juche in the 1970s, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The officials in the 1970s were genuine officials who wholeheartedly upheld their leader and carried out the party's decisions and instructions without fail under any difficult conditions. 
					
					 They always stood in the van of the advancing ranks and their intense loyalty to the party and the leader and high caliber were an engine for all work and practices. 
					
					 What was the most important in their ideological and moral traits was the undisputed loyalty to their leader. 
					
					 Loyalty is the noble ideological and moral trait which the officials should consider as the primary standard in their work and life. 
					
					 Their inexhaustible fervent enthusiasm, a high degree of zeal for work, staunch will and enterprising work style were important elements in the work style of those officials. 
					
					 Their working traits served as a powerful engine which brought about miracles and feats in all fields and at all units of the socialist construction in the 1970s.
					
					 Their steadfast party principle and uncompromising working spirit are the example to be followed by the officials at present. It was the characteristic features of the officials in that period to wage an uncompromising struggle against any phenomenon contrary to the party line and policies without tolerating or conniving at it. 
					
					 The cause of Juche revolution will make victorious progress when all officials wholeheartedly uphold the party and the leader and devotedly serve the country and its people just as those in the 1970s who remained boundlessly faithful to the great leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Will Not Remain Onlooker to U.S. Hostile Policy: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Not Remain Onlooker to U.S. Hostile Policy: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. representative speaking at the Board of Governors' meeting of the International Atomic Energy Agency said north Korea announced that it will review its nuclear policy under the "absurd pretext" of the U.S. hostile policy. He even said north Korea can never be recognized as a nuclear weapons state.
					 This is an open revelation of the U.S. intention to pursue the hostile policy toward the DPRK as before, Rodong Sinmun says in a bylined commentary Tuesday.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain an on-looker to the U.S. ever-more undisguised hostile moves but will do everything it can to defend the destiny of the country and the nation, the news analyst says.
					
					 Citing facts to prove the U.S. vicious pursuance of hostile policy toward the DPRK from Clinton administration to Obama administration, the commentary goes on:
					
					 The situation proves that unless the U.S. deep-rooted hostile policy toward the DPRK is removed, one can not expect a solution to any problem but will face escalating confrontation and increasing danger of conflict.
					
					 The U.S. administration authorities say that "they can never recognize north Korea as a nuclear weapons state" but it was not to get others' recognition that the DPRK accessed nukes.
					
					 It was compelled to have access to nukes because the world's biggest nuclear weapons possessor threatened to stifle it.
					
					 Gone never to return are the days when the U.S. threatened the DPRK with A-bomb.
					
					 Unless the U.S. renounces its hostile policy toward the DPRK, it will modernize and bolster its nuclear deterrent to the level beyond imagination.
					
					 The DPRK, which legitimately accessed nukes, will not care whether it is recognized as a nuclear weapons state or not.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S. Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S. Human Rights Abuses
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the European parliament adopted a decision urging its member nations including Poland and Romania to open to the public the investigation into the operation of secret prisons set up by the Central Intelligence Agency of the U.S. in their countries and human rights abuses.
					 Meanwhile, the United Nations Human Rights Council in its session on Sept. 17 bitterly denounced the U.S. for committing human rights abuses in the prison of its naval base in Guantanamo in breach of international law.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This indicates the international community's stand not to allow the human rights abuses by the U.S. any longer.
					
					 The "anti-terrorism" war being staged by the U.S. is the state-sponsored terrorism unprecedented in history and, at the same time, hideous human rights abuses.
					
					 There are ample reasons to put the U.S. on international human rights trial for its maltreatment and humiliation of prisoners in secret prisons abroad.
					
					 Great irony is that the U.S., which has no right to speak, kicked up the human rights racket on the international scale and takes issue with human rights performances in other countries, pointing an accusing finger at them.
					
					 This is just brigandish act of those who are steeped in arrogance, arbitrariness, tyranny and impudence.
					
					 No law in the world allows the U.S. violation of international law.
					
					 The U.S. should suffer punishment for its crimes.
					
					 The international community will surely put the U.S. on trial, a country that turned to a rogue-like human rights abuser, for its wanton violation of the international human rights norms.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Putting End to Lee Group's Moves to Escalate Confrontation of Social Systems
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Putting End to Lee Group's Moves to Escalate Confrontation of Social Systems
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article calls for putting an end to the south Korean Lee Myung Bak regime's confrontation of the social systems.
					 The confrontation of the social systems is the root cause of the collapse of the north-south relations, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The north-south relations that had favorably developed were brought to a collapse entirely because the Lee Myung Bak group enforced the ill-famed confrontation policy of "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars" in denial of the inter-Korean declarations after it came to power.
					
					 The Lee group's desperate moves for the confrontation of the social systems put the inter-Korean relations into the worst phase of collapse without any dialogue and cooperation.
					
					 This confrontation is bound to trigger off a military standoff.
					
					 The Lee group has worked hard to realize its ambition through military provocations and threat, taking an extreme hostile approach towards the ideology and social system in the DPRK. The "Cheonan" warship sinking case and the Yonphyong Island shelling incident broke out due to this wild ambition.
					
					 The group's moves to escalate the confrontation of the social systems are main hurdle in the way of achieving national reconciliation and unity and improving the north-south relations. 
					
					 As long as the Lee group is allowed to stay in power, the north-south relations can never get rid of the abyss of collapse.
					
					 The root cause of misfortune should be removed in good time and poisonous plants be rooted out without fail.
					
					 To wage a nation-wide struggle for foiling the Lee group's moves and severely punish the horde of traitors is the only way for bringing about a new phase in independent reunification.
					
					 The conservative forces in south Korea are making desperate efforts to stay in power with the "presidential election" close at hand.
					
					 The south Korean people suffered too much under the rule of the Lee group. The confrontation maniacs should no longer be allowed to stay in power. The tragic history of north-south standoff should not be allowed to repeat itself.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Ryu U Ik's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Ryu U Ik's Reckless Remarks
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Ryu U Ik, minister of Unification of south Korea, at a recent meet with foreign press hurled malignant slanders and calumnies at the DPRK, talking about "essential limitation". Traitor Ryu was so shameless as to say "the north was to blame for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations."
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This clearly shows his inveterate repugnance towards the ideology and social system in the DPRK and conscience of confrontation steeped to the marrow of his bone. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 As a matter of fact, what Ryu uttered is nothing but a shriek made by a guy taken aback by the mounting spirit of the DPRK. 
					
					 As far as the "limitation" is concerned, this word is appropriate to the wretched plight of the Lee Myung Bak regime now in the grip of a serious ruling crisis due to the total failure of its traitorous policy and the ceaseless disclosure of the scandals committed by the ruling quarters. 
					
					 It is well known to everybody that the inter-Korean relations which had favorably developed were driven to a collapse due to the frantic moves of the Lee group to escalate confrontation. 
					
					 The reckless remarks of Ryu U Ik are no more than rhetoric to cover up the group's acts of treachery and the ensuing consequences and escape public denunciation. 
					
					 No matter how desperately Ryu may kick up the confrontation racket against the DPRK, he can never escape his miserable end.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Ulterior Intention of S. Korean Regime's Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Ulterior Intention of S. Korean Regime's Smear Campaign against DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military said in public on Sept. 26 that a fishing boat of the DPRK crossed the "northern limit line" at about 9:30 p.m. the previous day and was warned to go back to the north.
					 As a proverb says union makes power, the puppet military confessed briefly after that there were no north's fishing boats that approached the "northern limit line" for the last few days.
					
					 A bylined commentary of DPRK's major paper Minju Joson Tuesday says this discloses the south Korean regime's smear campaign to mislead the public opinion at home and abroad and cover up its true colors as belligerent forces.
					
					 The disclosed campaign foretells that the regime can make a bigger farce against the DPRK, says the commentary, adding:
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by the regime is to find an excuse for provoking a war against the DPRK in the contentious waters at any cost and ignite an all-out war.
					
					 However, the south Korean regime's moves to ignite a war is as idle as a newborn puppy that knows no fear of a tiger.
					
					 It is the unanimous will of the army and people of the DPRK that if the belligerent forces dare make a provocation, they will take it as a golden opportunity and turn it into a great war for national reunification. 
					
					 The warmongers will see how steadfast the army and people of the DPRK are in their will to turn out in the final showdown for reunification and will suffer the DPRK army's merciless blows.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Shunning Issue of Japan's Settlement of Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Shunning Issue of Japan's Settlement of Its Past Crimes
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on Sept. 24 in an editorial accused the puppet regime of turning its face away from the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The editorial recalled that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade did not mention the sexual slavery enforced by the Imperial Japanese Army in its draft speech at the UN General Assembly session.
					
					 This was prompted by the "government's" intention to avoid any friction with Japan in pursuance of its political objective, it said, and continued:
					
					 The regime should urge Japan to redeem its past crimes as early as possible and should not shun this issue.
					
					 It should discard its passive attitude and opt for positive actions for the settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.

articles.title: Spirit for Reunification Mounts among Young S. Koreans
articles.content:
Spirit for Reunification Mounts among Young S. Koreans
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Reunification Basketball Contest for Youth and Students took place at Hanyang University of south Korea on Sept. 22.  It was held to mark the 5th anniversary of October 4 declaration under the sponsorship of the Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					 The speakers said the contest was kicked off on the occasion oif the anniversary of the October 4 declaration last year in reflection of the desire for peace and national reunification of the youth and students.
					
					 The second basketball contest this year has drawn a great number of youth and students, they noted.
					
					 The youth and students should play a main role in the movement for peaceful reunification of Korea, they said, adding the sweats shed by the youth and students will pay off in opening the gate to the reunification.
					
					 They voiced their hope to see the improvement in the south-north relations and hold games with youth and students from the north and abroad.
					
					 They called for taking the lead in bringing earlier the day.
					
					 The participants in the contest showed their firm will through the matches to remove the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula and achieve peace and national reunification by implementing the north-south declarations without fail.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Life Lauded by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Life Lauded by Foreign Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A Brazilian organization and a regional body posted special write-ups on their Internet websites on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the passing of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on Sept. 21 an article praising her exploits illustrated with her photo on its Internet homepage.
					
					 The article said under the title of "Kim Jong Suk's glorious life" that she protected President Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life in every battlefield of the anti-Japanese war including the battle in Dashahe gully in Antu County.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk's life was a genuine patriot.
					
					 Born in a patriotic family, she experienced bitter sorrow over being a member of the stateless nation and participated in the sacred war for the liberation of the country in her early years.
					
					 She performed heroic feats with outstanding military wisdom and stratagem, matchless grit and bravery and mysterious marksmanship during the period of the hard-fought anti-Japanese war.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk trained guerrillas as fighters possessed of ardent love for the country and its people and indomitable faith and will by setting a practical example at all times.
					
					 She visited different parts of the country after the liberation of Korea, powerfully arousing the people to the building of a new country.
					
					 She made a great contribution to developing the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the regular Korean People's Army and firmly consolidating the military foundation for building a new country.
					
					 Her noble life dedicated to the liberation of the country and the building of a new country will shine forever with the eternally prospering DPRK.
					
					 The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on Sept. 22 posted an article titled "Kim Jong Suk always remembered by the world people" accompanied with a photo of the woman commander of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Bangladeshi, Nepalese Figures Release Statements on Anniversary of Publication of October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Bangladeshi, Nepalese Figures Release Statements on Anniversary of Publication of October 4 Declaration 
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi and Nepalese figures released statements on Sept. 26 on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, said that October 4 will mark the 5th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					
					 The declaration, along with the June 15 joint declaration, serves as a great joint programme for reunification and a patriotic banner to be held high by all Koreans in their struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, he noted, adding:
					
					 The declaration is a banner of independent reunification which confirmed once again the idea of "By our nation itself" the validity and vitality of which have been clearly proved through the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 The Korean nation will usher in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity only when it does everything as indicated by the declaration.
					
					 Manik Lal Shrestha, chairman of the Nepalese Committee for Supporting the Reunification of Korea, said:
					
					 The present south Korean authorities are stepping up their hostile policy toward the DPRK and committing military provocations against it in total denial of the October 4 declaration, driving the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 It is clear to everyone what is source of the tense situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 We demand the U.S. and south Korean authorities stop their actions against the desire of all Koreans for peace and reunification of the country.

articles.title: British Organizations Denounce S. Korea's Reckless Military Provocation
articles.content:
British Organizations Denounce S. Korea's Reckless Military Provocation
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement on Sept. 24 in denunciation of the south Korean military provocation against the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We bitterly condemn the vicious and foolish provocation perpetrated by the south Korean navy in the waters of the West Sea of Korea on Sept. 21.
					
					 This clearly shows the bellicose and aggressive nature of the south Korean puppet army instigated by the U.S.
					
					 They not only intruded into the territorial waters of the DPRK but fired bullets and shells at civilian fishing boats.
					
					 This was a product of the anti-DPRK moves of the south Korean authorities to preserve the illegal "northern limit line."
					
					 Obviously, this provocation not only escalates the tension on the Korean Peninsula but may spark off the second Korean war.
					
					 We fully support the principled stand clarified by the Southwestern Front Command of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities should stop at once the foolish military provocation against the DPRK.

articles.title: British Organizations Demand Pullback of U.S. Forces from S. Korea
articles.content:
British Organizations Demand Pullback of U.S. Forces from S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement on Sept. 21, 67 years since the U.S. troops occupied south Korea.
					 The statement recalled that the U.S. imperialists brutally suppressed and killed Koreans after illegally occupying south Korea on Sept. 8, 1945.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 They perpetrated such hideous crime as dividing Korea with a history of 5 000 years into two parts. 
					
					 The U.S. military presence in south Korea is the main factor of Korea's division.
					
					 Over the last 67 years since their occupation, the U.S. forces have brought misfortune and pain to the Korean nation and brutally suppressed south Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea are making no scruple of committing killing, rape, theft and drug trafficking and other crimes, while enjoying extraterritorial rights.
					
					 South Korea is forced to pay huge amount of money for the upkeep of the U.S. forces and their military bases.
					
					 The U.S. military presence in south Korea has strained the situation on the Korean Peninsula and threatened peace.
					
					 This is the most vivid expression of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is working hard not only to perpetuate its forces' presence in south Korea but also put the whole of Korea under its control and use it as a military springboard for dominating the Asian continent.
					
					 The Korean nation never requires the U.S. military presence in south Korea.
					
					 We demand the U.S. forces withdraw from south Korea, taking with them destructive weapons.
					
					 Yankees U.S. imperialists, quit south Korea!
					
					 Korea is one!

articles.title: European Media Denounce Japan for Not Making Apology for Its Wrongdoings
articles.content:
European Media Denounce Japan for Not Making Apology for Its Wrongdoings
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- European media bitterly denounced Japan for its impudent behavior of not making repentance for its wrongdoings in the past.
					 The German radio commented that Japan's lack of repentance for the past history is mainly behind the territorial disputes with its neighboring countries, urging Japan to look back upon its past history as the aggressor during the period of the Second World War just as Germany did.
					
					 The French paper Express in an article on its Internet website said that conflict over Tok Islets is attributable to Japan that has refused to liquidate the past wrongdoings. The article accused Japan of its attitude pursuing its own interests.
					
					 The article noted that Japan has failed to make an apology, to say nothing of repentance for the wrongdoings, a contrast to Germany which owned full responsibility for the past massacre committed by it. 
					
					 The UK paper Financial Times in an article contributed by a professor emeritus of a Swiss institute expressed astonishment at Japan which does not feel guilty conscience for its past crimes. 
					
					 The Spanish paper El Mundo in an article on its Internet website said that Japan's ambition of territorial expansion can not be justified.

articles.title: Chinese Paper Ridicules Japan's Double-Dealing Act
articles.content:
Chinese Paper Ridicules Japan's Double-Dealing Act
						
 Beijing, October 1 (KCNA) -- The People's Daily of China on Sept. 28 carried an article flailing Japan's double-dealing behavior under the title of "Is Japan qualified to talk about 'trend'?"
					 Japan, which seriously infringed upon the sovereignty of China by "nationalizing" the Diaoyu Islands, is ridiculously talking about jointly settling the issue of the islands at the UN General Assembly session, alleging that the trend of the times should be the starting point.  
					
					 Recalling this fact, the article queried if Japan is qualified to argue about "trend".
					
					 As there are fundamental and moral obligations in the international relationship, image of a country can not be face-lifted by itself, it noted, asking why Japan has not yet redeemed its past history of aggression wars. 
					
					 The main reason that Japan is still not welcomed by the public is that it has talked much "good words" and done many "wicked deeds", it noted.
					
					 There is the need to advise the Japanese politicians keen on despicable diplomacy that excessive conceit would take its toll, the article concluded.

articles.title: Construida estatua de bronce de Kim Jong Il en unidad 10215 del EPC
articles.content:
Construida estatua de bronce de Kim Jong Il en unidad 10215 del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo erguida en la unidad 10215 del Ejercito Popular de Corea la estatua de bronce del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il.
					La estatua reproduce la imagen del Generalisimo, vestido en abrigo de campana y con una mano puesta en la cintura, llamando a todo el ejercito y pueblo a la victoria final y bendiciendo el futuro de la potencia del monte Paektu que prosperara siempre.
					
					Tuvo lugar este martes la ceremonia de inauguracion de la estatua. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de los sectores relacionados, los oficiales y soldados de la unidad citada, los familiares de los militares, los funcionarios y los empleados de las unidades que contribuyeron a la construccion de la estatua.
					
					La develaron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam y Kim Won Hong.
					
					Fue colocado al pie de la estatua un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					A continuacion, quedaron depositados un cesto en nombre comun del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, y el otro en nombre de la unidad 10215 del EPC, y etc.
					
					Todos los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje hacia la estatua.
					
					En su discurso de la ocasion, Kim Won Hong senalo que el Generalisimo fortalecio el PTC como eterno partido del Presidente Kim Il Sung y convirtio a la patria socialista en una invencible potencia ideo-politica y militar de talla mundial.
					
					Destaco que la extraordinaria direccion del Generalisimo devino la garantia de victoria que permitio frustrar todos los complots anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y otros imperialistas y defender fidedignamente la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias y el socialismo del Juche.
					
					Exhorto a todos a luchar con mas dinamismo por la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche uniendose mas firmemente en torno al Mariscal.
					
					Tras escuchar explicaciones de la estatua, los participantes dieron una vuelta a ella.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del embajador de Suecia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del embajador de Suecia
						
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio el dia 2 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Reino de Suecia en Corea, Karl-Olof Andersson.
					Tras el recibo, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Delegado coreano se refiere a elevar capacidad de accion del G-77
articles.content:
Delegado coreano se refiere a elevar capacidad de accion del G-77
						
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- En la reunion de cancilleres del G-77 sostenida el 28 de septiembre, el jefe de la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pronuncio el discurso.
					La realidad demanda al G-77 mantener la estrategia de unidad y elevar constantemente la capacidad de accion conjunta para superar los desafios que bloquean su avance, senalo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					Lo mas importante en fortalecer la accion conjunta del G-77 es prestar atencion merecida en proteger y realizar la soberania, el interes y el derecho a desarrollo de los paises en vias de desarrollo.
					
					Para elevar la capacidad de accion conjunta del G-77, tambien es importante establecer correctamente el modo de desarrollo de la economia conveniente a la tendencia de la economia mundial y las circunstancias concretas de los paises en vias de desarrollo.
					
					En las relaciones internacionales de economia se agrandan mas las contradicciones entre el Norte y el Sur, lo cual exige al G-77 hacer esfuerzos mas activos por activar la cooperacion Sur-Sur.
					
					Ahora la RPDC mejora y fortalece constantemente la estructura  economica y el modo de desarrollo convenientes a su propia circunstancia y de acuerdo con la tendencia mundial al desarrollo sostenible y fomenta activamente el intercambio y cooperacion internacionales por el respecto.
					
					En el futuro tambien el gobierno de la RPDC hara aportes activos a llevar a feliz termino la empresa comun del G-77 para el establecimiento de nuevas relaciones economicas basadas en la justicia, igualdad e imparcialidad.

articles.title: Ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos es la mas popular
articles.content:
Ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos es la mas popular
						
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el 25 de septiembre pasado que implantara la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos.
					Esta medida es aplaudida por los funcionarios de la rama de educacion por haber profundizado el anterior sistema de ensenanza obligatoria general de 11 anos.
					
					Citado por la ACNC, Sin Se Hung (49 anos de edad), primer viceministro de Educacion Normal adscrito al Comite de Educacion, dijo:
					
					El sistema de ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos es el mas justo que permite perfeccionar la educacion normal secundaria conforme a la epoca de la industria informatica y la economia intelectual.
					
					El nuevo sistema permitio a los ninos de las escuelas primarias aliviar el pesado de estudio y entender mejor los contenidos de las lecciones.
					
					Ademas contribuye el sistema cientifico de ensenanza obligatoria, segun el cual se lleva a cabo  la educacion de los ninos y jovenes conforme al crecimiento fisico, edad y caracteristica psicologica.
					
					Se registrara un viraje trascendental en el contenido y el nivel cualitativo de educacion secundaria para que los alumnos asimilen plenamente los conocimientos amplios de acuerdo con el desarrollo vertiginoso de las ciencias y tecnicas y posean las capacidades capaces de librar las actividades independientes en la sociedad.
					
					La rectora de la Universidad Pedagogica Kim Chol Ju, Ju Jong Sil (50 anos de edad) apunto:
					
					El nuevo sistema de ensenanza obligatoria resulta el mas popular y el mejor que permite dar ensenanza gratis de nivel alto a las generaciones venideras hasta el periodo de edad laboral y el Estado se responsabiliza y se encarga de todos los costos  escolares.
					
					La realidad de hoy, en que esta preparada la firme garantia para el desarrollo de la labor pedagogica del pais en la etapa elevada, nos requiere a nosotros, que nos encargamos directamente de la educacion de las generaciones venideras, desempenar toda su responsabilidad y papel.
					
					Gracias a la implantacion del nuevo sistema de ensenanza, en que esta materializado el amor por el futuro y la generacion venidera del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, nuestra patria avanzara a pasos mas firmes hacia el pais civilizado socialista.
